title: [Large-Scale] Serious Game-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Workshop for Healthcare Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistics and data interpretation skills, with healthcare management experience
context.additional_context: A game-based learning environment for healthcare administrators to improve mathematical decision-making skills, emphasizing collaborative learning via BYOD

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex medical data with 80% accuracy through game-based simulations.
Learners can derive three or more resource allocation optimization strategies via in-game decision-making simulations.
Learners can improve team-based problem-solving efficiency by 40% using competition/collaboration mechanisms with peers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
